title: Question about Instalockers
body:
So I just played a game where me and another player both wen't mid.

In the pregame normal lobby, I called 'mid' before anybody even joined before others called.
I then assumed I got mid and didn't really pay attention to any other picks.

I was playing Yasuo.
Once we get in game our teams Zed is claiming he got mid and the Janna is also saying the same thing (his premade).
I try to explain that I called first to him and he just abuses me/flames me instantly leading to be believing it wasn't a misunderstanding and he just instalocked his role.

Anyway, game goes on and I go mid. Yes I could have just gone bot instead to end the argument but I didn't due to his attitude. The premade Zed and Janna flame me all game and use all chat to tell people I instalocked and should be reported  non stop. 

My question is, am I at fault here? I take it some of you are going to say "yes why didn't you just go bot" but I don't see why we have to always give into the whims of trolls/instalockers? Was it perfectly fine that I refused to go bot and stayed mid? I've been punished in the past (1+ year ago) and my next punishment is a perma ban so its important I don't break any rules.

Match History:
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Byte

Game where Yasuo is Byte and Zed is **name removed**

replies.body: Should've just run it down mid
Thankfully , we now have unranked draft, to get rid of them.
The whole lane calling system is stupid don't worry about it, draft pick is being tested in OCE and will hopefully be a permanent thing so you won't need to worry about instalockers anymore.

Nope. I haven't been seeing a ton of Insta lockers but my usual attitude is if you go to another lane your giving them what they want so thee just more encouraged to do it. 

Of course if I'm not super set on a role I will sometimes change. Every now and then it's just easier to go with the flow

Edit: To quote RougeyStony no namerino shamerino. A mod will take the names out if you don't
just report and move on who cares let the shit system riot made sort it out
